mapper.select: select doubtId as doubtId, d.id as id, no as no, doubt_time as doubtDate, commit_time as commitDate, flag as flag, doubter as doubter, d.fieldid as fieldId, v.name as fieldName, description as description, d.menuid as menuId from crf_doubt d, dt_crfstage_var v where v.menuid=d.menuid and d.menuid=#{menuId} and d.id=#{id} and d.fieldid=v.fieldid and flag!=1

select doubtId as doubtId, d.id as id, no as no, doubt_time as doubtDate, commit_time as commitDate, flag as flag, doubter as doubter, d.fieldid as fieldId, v.name as fieldName, description as description, d.menuid as menuId from crf_doubt d, dt_crfstage_var v where d.id=#{id} and flag!=1 and d.fieldId=v.fieldId
select v.id as id, v.name as name from dt_crfstage s, dt_crfstage_var v where s.menuid=v.menuid and v.menuid=#{menuId} order by v.id asc
mapper.update: update crf_doubt set commit_time=#{commitDate}, flag=#{flag} where id=#{id} and doubtId=#{doubtId}
mapper.select: select menuid as menuId, count(1) as unDeal from crf_doubt where flag=0 and id=#{id} group by menuid
